price: 136. Dijeron: “No importa si nos exhortas o no.
arabic: قَالُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوَعَظۡتَ أَمۡ لَمۡ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡوَٰعِظِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū sawāon ʿalaynā awaʿaẓta am lam takun mina al-wāʿiẓīna
